de.bitbrain.braingdx.tmx

Interface TiledMapManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TiledMapManagerImpl

    public interface TiledMapManager
extends com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
    This manager gives extended support for TiledMap objects. It features an API to query the map for details and provides an own rendering integration for braingdx.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Miguel Gonzalez Sanchez
